Vatafu Stefan

From: Bucharest, Romania

Connect with me

Life Motto

“Creating opportunities means looking where others are not” - Mark Cuban

My Skills

CSS

My road so far

Regina Maria

2022 - Current

Role: IT Consultant

  • Making different reports by writing SQL queries, using different data from several systems through a Data Lake, and giving there queries to the BI team who will implement them in Qlik.
  • I'm working with technologies like Dynamics 365 from Microsoft, where I take the business requirements, analyze them and adapt them in a technical way, presenting these requests to the development team.
  • During the development I ensure the support of the technical team and I also deal with the testing part of the new functionalities.
  • Organization of the team and the test plan.
  • The constant update of the implementation plan.
  • Ensuring post-implementation support.
  • Microsoft SQL Server operation:
    • Correction in the database of certain records.
    • Implementation of different jobs.
    • Verification of various data.

Regina Maria

2021 - 2022

Role: Software Analyst

  • I'm working in Microsoft Dynamics like CRM, and SQL. I provide technical support to my colleagues from the rest of the departments who use CRM Dynamics 365.

Regina Maria

2021 - 2021

Role: Intern
